name: Fall 2019 - 470 - Cutthroat Dungeon
description:
Cutthroat Dungeon takes culinary cooking to a whole new level. Gather resources from a monster infested dungeon where you will obtain the necessary ingredients to bring your restaurant to the top of the culinary food chain. Make your restaurant stand out from the competition by crafting different ingredients from the variety of resources you’ve collected. Each monster you kill add to ever growing recipe book.

The game is currently in major development and many of the features are unavailable. This is a prototype and bugs will be encountered. The game in its current state contains its basic attacking mechanics against multiple enemies. Explore through the first dungeon, annihilating all the enemies.
